name: God Complex - True Crimes Behind Stained Glass

episodes.title: God Complex Podcast Live-03/30/25
episodes.description:
We asked Hamilton, AL. residents to join us and discuss (good or bad) 
 ‘The Ramp’. 
The Ramp is an international “ministry” founded by Karen Wheaton. It is primarily focused on teens and young adults. They have weekly services, hold conferences, and have a school of ministry. Many who have left The Ramp now believe it to be a cult. The city of Hamilton has less than 7,000 people in it.
We discuss the possible implications of a huge “ministry” taking in reportedly millions of dollars, meanwhile the residence there struggle to even have clean water.

episodes.title: The Ramp Leader who is a Convicted Sexual Predator
episodes.description: Andrew High was one of the most influential and respected members of the Ramp's ministry team called Chosen. This video breaks down the 3 alleged occurrences of sexual harassment and abuse that we currently know of, and how the Ramp leadership allowed him to continue to work with children in their kids ministry even though they were aware of his crimes.

episodes.title: Ex Ramp Student Survived Abuse by Leader - Sean Interview - God Complex LIVE
God Complex Live - 2/21/25
episodes.description: Stephen, Jennifer and Joey each tell their stories about joining and leaving the Ramp, and give some updates on various allegations and stories of cult like behavior going on at this ministry.

episodes.title: Interrogation “SOZOs” at the Ramp - God Complex Shorts - Joey Trieb
“Forced Fasting” at the Ramp - God Complex Shorts - Joey Trieb
episodes.description: Many students at the Ramp are so broke, and so unable to earn enough money due to the Ramp's extreme schedules and demands, that they have a hard time buying food and often go hungry. This happens so often that students starting referring to it as "forced fasting".

episodes.title: Exposing SA & System Abuse @ The Ramp
episodes.description: Exposing SA and systemic abuse at THE RAMP PART 4. Recorded Jan 23 while working with the mentioned victim who has since shared her story and can be viewed on FB JAN 24 with her full story, screenshots of the grooming and more.

episodes.title: The Ramp taking over Hamilton? - God Complex Shorts - Joey Trieb
episodes.description: We have some questions about the crazy amount of Hamilton property owned by the Ramp

episodes.title: Rebukes and personal assessments at the Ramp - God Complex Shorts - Joey Trieb
episodes.description: What it’s like to have m your phone and laptop checked, get “rebuked”, and sit through a personal assessment at the Ramp.

episodes.title: Was I in a cult? - God Complex Shorts - Joey Trieb
episodes.description: An introduction to Joey’s series on the Ramp, a Christian ministry many consider to be a cult.
